name: Pirates o Fish
description:
This is a game for the GDL 17 Gamejam with the theme fishing.

here you are simply on your boat with ur cannon shooting fish and collecting them... did I forget to mention you are also being attacked by pirates?

This is my first game jam and I joined late so this is about 24 hours of work in a 72 hour jam. hope ya all enjoy this and tell me what I could do better.

Controls:

-------------------------

W,A,S,D = Move

Left Click = Shoot

Move mouse = Aim

-------------------------

-Credits-

Music by Baljeet Singh (The music composer NOT the singer)

Sound Design by Kristaoss

Game design, Concept, Art, Programming, etc by RexTGun.
